english.segment1: ..neverending.. Always. You will never end. Because. You're always. neverending. You were there before. There was beginning. Always. You were. You are neverending. Here You are now. With us here. We are found. In You. And this makes all the difference. This changes everything. Making our whole existence. Worth something so we can sing. La, la, la.. And You make all the difference. Yeah, You change everything. You make our whole existence. Worth something so we sing. La, la, la..
